exam.question: Because a degree from a good university is the means to a better job, education is one of the most __________ areas in Japanese life.

answer.explain: the most competitive area： 最有竞争力的地方。 句意： 因为优秀大学的学位是找到一份好工作的资本， 所以教育在日本人的生活中是最有竞争力的领域。 sophisticated： 世故的； considerate： 体贴的， 考虑周到的； superficial： 表面的； 肤浅的。

sentences.sContent: Some US industries are not as competitive as they have been in the past.
sentences.sCn: 美国有些行业不如以前有竞争力了。

sentences.sContent: The team seems to have lost its competitive edge recently (= its ability to compete well ) .
sentences.sCn: 这支球队近来好像丧失了竞争优势。

sentences.sContent: ...China provides opportunities to millions of online retailers to sell goods at very competitive prices...
...and it offers members of the mobile class competitive salaries and higher bargaining power...
...Higher education has become a big and competitive business nowadays...

synos.tran: 竞争的；比赛的；求胜心切的

phrases.pCn: 竞争价格；公开招标价格
竞争态势；竞争环境；竞争性的局面
竞争地位；竟争水平，竞争能力
竞技性运动；竞赛体育运动
竞争激烈的就业市场；充满竞争的就业市场

trans.tranCn: 竞争的， 比赛的； 好竞争的， 求胜心切的； 有竞争力的
trans.tranOther: determined or trying very hard to be more successful than other people or businesses
